content.text: I'm not close to my family either, but I love my pet dogs.
I'm a working musician who is passionate about my dogs too!
That's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and piano, and I sing. I love performing live.
That sounds amazing! I'm not very musical, but I love to listen to music.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different types of music, but I'm mostly into rock and pop.
Me too! I love classic rock and pop music.
What are some of your favorite bands?
I love the Beatles, the Rolling Stones, and the Beach Boys.
Those are all great bands! I love the Beatles too.
What's your favorite Beatles song?
I don't know if I could pick just one, but I love "Yesterday" and "Let It Be."
Those are both great songs! I also love "I Want to Hold Your Hand" and "In My Life."
I love those songs too! I could talk about music all day long.
Me too! It's one of my favorite things to talk about.
What's your favorite thing about music?
I love how it can make me feel different emotions.
Me too! It can make me feel happy, sad, angry, or anything in between.
It's a powerful thing.
It sure is.
I'm glad we had this conversation.
Me too
